message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm confident it will be a valuable asset to you. I'm offering it to you for $20000, reflecting its true worth and potential impact on your operations.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on your product. However, considering my budget constraints, I am proposing a purchase price of $15000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
